Users in this role can read basic directory information. This role should be used for: 1) Granting a specific set of guest users read access instead of granting it to all guest users. 2) Granting a specific set of non-admin users access to Azure Portal when "Restrict access to Microsoft Entra portal to admins only" is set to "Yes". 3) Granting service principals access to directory where Directory.Read.All is not an option.
